items.title: I am The Post’s ‘federal government whisperer.’ It’s been brutal.
items.description: One reporter’s effort to show how Trump was transforming government brought her 1,168 new sources — and nearly broke her.

items.title: Congress set records in 2025, some more dubious than others
items.description: Republican lawmakers reflect on a year without much productivity and greater ceding of powers to the White House.
